# Furniture Props

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/equip-furniture-props-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:58:21.523789

---

The template is a catalog of [props](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#prop) pulled from the [Galleries tab](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary) in the [Creative inventory](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary) that can be used as furniture or decorations on your own islands. From this template, you can view and select these items, [equip](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#equip) them to your [Quick Bar](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#quick-bar), then bring them to any island you've created and [place](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#place) them there.

To find out more about props and how to place them, check out building your first island.

## Finding Equip Furniture Props

You can access this template through your [personal rift](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#personal-rift) in the Creative [hub](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#hub).

Follow these steps to load the House Furniture Gallery template.

1. Press the command for **Use Console** to bring up the **Game Creation** screen.

   [![Use Console](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/af944962-7519-4c9e-a874-e067ce11d10a?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/af944962-7519-4c9e-a874-e067ce11d10a?resizing_type=fit)
2. From the **Game Creation** screen, select **Create New** to bring up the **Select Type** screen.

   [![Game Creation Screen](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8bda7454-371b-4ceb-a14e-3a4fb55ce607?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8bda7454-371b-4ceb-a14e-3a4fb55ce607?resizing_type=fit)
3. Click the **Template Islands** tab to view the templates available.

   [![Template Islands Screen](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f69efdc7-cc48-4427-bc0b-6288b8306341?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f69efdc7-cc48-4427-bc0b-6288b8306341?resizing_type=fit)
4. Scroll down, then click to select the **House Furniture Gallery Full Catalogue XL**. Click **Confirm** to load the template.

## Using this Template

You can equip props from this catalog onto your **Quick Bar**. To do this:

1. From [Create mode](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#create-mode), press the **`** key to equip the **phone**.
2. Highlight an item and press a number on your keyboard that corresponds to an empty Quick Bar slot.

The items you equip here will load with you when you return to your own island.

You can also use the steps above to replace items in your Quick Bar, either in this catalog or when you return to your island.

## Equip Furniture Prop's Contents

The props in this catalog are grouped by theme on the island.
